item.source: Release Date: Sep 29 @ 9am PST (noon EST / 6pm UK)!

item.title: Release Date: Sep 29 @ 9am PST (noon EST / 6pm UK)!
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
When the king is deeeeead

And the peasants fleeeed

Will you fight,

For the Throne of Lies?

You have to use your head

Watch what’s said

For the foolish surely dies…

It’s a Throne of Lies

A throne none the less,

Well…I gueeeeess.

It’s a Throne of Lies

I confess,

The throne…will be miiiine!

\ Musical Instrumental plays /

Throne of Lies: The Castle of Conspiracy

Bring your friends to your nearest Cinema to our cause, coming soon!

\ Trailer teaser ends, not before split-scenes showing the purple rose and bloodied eye in black screen /

Read full topic
